name: Landgrab
description: Fundraise land, one tile at a time!

DEVISE_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

HASHID_SALT.description: A salt used to generate Hashids for obfuscating database IDs.

HERE_MAPS_API_KEY.description: API key for HERE Maps (if provided, here maps layer is included in maps) - see https://platform.here.com/

SITE_TITLE.description: The title of the site, displayed in the browser title bar and headers etc.

WHAT3WORDS_API_KEY.description: What3Words.com API key for converting coords to 3 word addresses (e.g. to generate tiles for a plot)
